name: Iron
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: The IRON stablecoin provides strong integration with Iron Finance - a multi-chain, decentralized, non-custodial ecosystem of DeFi products, protocols, and use cases. Iron Finance is currently live on Polygon, Avalanche, & Fantom.
